articles.title: French tech giant Capgemini to sell US subsidiary working for ICE - BBC
articles.description: The firm's move comes amid global scrutiny of the methods used by the US immigration enforcement agency.
articles.content: Criticism of ICE practices has intensified in recent weeks since the shooting of 37-year-old Pretti, the second fatal shooting of a US citizen since immigration agents began surging several cities ac… [+102 chars]

articles.author: Chris Smith
articles.title: The Reason Why OLED TVs Are So Expensive - bgr.com
articles.description: OLED TVs are more expensive due to how they are manufactured, the materials used, and the size they are made in. Additional tech features can also raise costs.
articles.content: You've seen plenty of deals for OLED TVs during the Black Friday and Super Bowl shopping seasons, but you're yet to pull the trigger. The OLED TV models are still more expensive than LCD options. Als… [+1447 chars]
